I have a solution for those who have error
"unable to find ubisoft game launcher".
You just have to rename registry entry
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\UBISOFT\Ubisoft Game Launcher
to
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\UBISOFT\Launcher
and the game becomes fully playable.
I spent hours to figure out that. What a stupid fuck this globe@ to rename a default path?
The videos are highly and noticeably downgraded (the video folder is 153 mb, though I don't know the original size), but there are nothing really special in them.
